pr_title: [RW-5961][risk=no] Updated language on preview->edit runtime error

timeline.message: [RW-5961][risk=no] Updated language on preview->edit runtime error

timeline.bodyText: isn't this logic flipped? The user can only see the compute configuration panel if enableCustomRuntimes is true.
timeline.author: ericsong

replies.bodyText: Oof, thanks for catching that. I swapped the logic around so it would be easier to remove the code, but seemingly failed to move the text.
replies.author: calbach
